profile_data.summary: I am a Machine Learning researcher and practitioner with a BSc in Computer Science and Engineering with a machine learning major. Previously worked as an Assistant Professor and lecturer in a University in Bangladesh and supervised more than 300 mobile application and web application developments.
profile_data.headline: Actively Looking for Opportunities | Summer 2023 Intern @ LLNL| Ms in CS at Texas State University Class of 2023 | Applied ML Researcher

experience.description: Leveraging LLM for time series analysis and HPC job scheduling, RAG based fine tuned LLM for performance analysis, Multi-source contrastive learning based subspace generation
experience.title: Research Scientist

experience.description:
- Achieved 82% improvement over regular transfer learning approaches with proxy apps data with 1% few shot test samples
- Designed Transfer learning models for performance prediction from scientific data with both homogeneous and heterogeneous features
- Implemented Transfer learning models and techniques including linear probing, fine-tuning with custom-built models, Meta Agnostic Machine Learning models, ensemble-based models, stacked models
and residual models in zero-shot and few-shot approaches in Tensorflow for regression problems with distribution shifts for both homogeneous and heterogeneous features.
• Designed feature importance calculation in an unsupervised learning manner using SHAP and subspace-based method, two methods to measure distribution similarity across domains
• Submitted 1 paper titled “Enabling Transfer Learning Across Heterogeneous Domains using Input Alignment” in ISPASS 2024
experience.title: Graduate Research Assistant

experience.description:
- Designed two novel methodologies for relative performance predic￾tion across a pair of platforms using synthetic data generation and
chained neural networks
- Investigated distribution of different application's data collected on CPU and GPU-based platforms, visual analysis with heatmap and other visualization tools
- Applied 13 machine learning models which include Linear Regression, KKN Regressor, Decision Tree Regressor, Support Vector Regressor, XGBoost Regressor, Random Forrest Regressor, LightGBM Regressor, AdaBoost Regressor, Extra Trees Regressor, Bagging Regressor, Ridge CV, Lasso CV, Elastic Net CV, Bayesian Ridge and ARD regressor with hyperparameter tuning with grid search cv on this data for performance prediction
• Submitted a paper titled "Relative Performance Prediction using Semi-Supervised Learning"
experience.title: Computing Scholar Intern

experience.description:
- Achieved 93% accuracy in Anomaly detection in real-time streaming data
 - Designed a pluggable module including statistical models, machine learning models and tree-based models to integrate into the fully functioning system
- Evaluated these models with 7 benchmark machine learning dataset for anomaly detection in streaming data
- A paper on this work titled "Signal Processing Based Method for Real-Time Anomaly Detection in High-Performance Computing" was published in COMPSAC 2022
experience.title: Summer Research Intern

publications.description: Developed Fourier Based FFT and leveraged statistical model ARIMA and unsupervised model Random Robust Cut Forrest for anomaly detection in continuous streaming data using Keras, SKLearn, and Tensorflow.
